select c.id, c.name, c.room, c.begin_date, c.end_date, c.master_id, c.subject, c.update_time, e.name masterName, (case when begin_date > now() then '未开班' when now() > end_date then '已结课' else '在读中' end) status from clazz as c left join emp e on c.master_id = e.id

and c.end_date between #{begin} and #{end}
order by c.update_time desc
